Set the Cobol Dialect; Possible values include ICopybookDialects.FMT_MAINFRAME - Mainframe Cobol ICopybookDialects.FMT_FUJITSU - Written for the old Fujitsu Cobol 3 compiler ICopybookDialects.FMT_GNU_COBOL - GNU Cobol (formerly Open Cobol) on a Little Endian machine (e.g Intel).
